round_best: Develop a meta-learning framework that leverages user feedback to dynamically adjust and calibrate performance metrics for AI models across different domains. The framework would use a combination of reinforcement learning and Bayesian optimization to iteratively refine metric weights and parameters based on discrepancies between predicted outcomes and user-reported satisfaction. This approach ensures that the calibrated metrics continually evolve to better align with the complexities and nuances of human preferences across varying contexts and applications.
